title: How to Mount a Motherboard in a Case

steps.title: Verify that you are as static free as possible.
steps.content: Verify that you are as static free as possible.

steps.title: Open the case you want to mount the motherboard in.
steps.content: Open the case you want to mount the motherboard in.

steps.title: Verify all metal hex nuts are in place to fit the new board.
steps.content: Verify all metal hex nuts are in place to fit the new board. Make sure none will short any solder points on the board.

steps.title: Verify all plastic spacers are in place to accommodate the new motherboard.
steps.content: Verify all plastic spacers are in place to accommodate the new motherboard.

steps.title: Place the motherboard into the case.
steps.content: Place the motherboard into the case.

steps.title: Screw the screws in place to hold the board in place.
steps.content: Screw the screws in place to hold the board in place. Make sure they are the only thing that line up with the hex nuts...That is the whole purpose of those.
